Row.Text: A longer explanation for the event. Can be an entire story if you so like. Of course, if it's too long people might not even bother reading it, but something like this should work. Or a little longer if you need to.
This is an example event text.
The Great Modhound of Erebus, Jheral, has arrived at your shores, and is currently in the process of unravelling reality. What will you do?
Flee! I don't want to become part of his horrible fantasies!
Fight! I'm sure he can't mod me out quick enough to win!
You will be edited out of the game!
Nothing. Just let him have his fun.
His Mod-Fu is weak! I can beat him at his own game!
This is madness! You will destroy the entire game!

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque quis purus ut turpis aliquam egestas. Integer euismod metus quis porttitor eleifend. Vivamus eleifend at felis sed vestibulum. Vestibulum a leo pellentesque tellus mollis elementum.
